publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1439 Mr John Munro: Less Favoured Areas-That the Parliament notes the concerns of crofters about the Less Favoured Area subsidy that has replaced the Hill Livestock Compensation Allowance and acknowledges the implementation of transitional arrangements but believes that the aid could be better targeted to help those in the most marginal areas and that work still needs to be done to achieve an optimum solution that will safeguard those producers on the poorest land.
